true_testimonies_before_fabrication.true_testimony: I remember being in the van with Officer Kane. He was asking about my time in juvie. Then everything went black. Next thing I knew, people were screaming and there was blood.
I arrived on scene after the incident. Officer Kane was a good man. Eddie Torres has a history of violence against authority figures.

testimony_analysis.eddie_reliability: Memory gaps make him seem unreliable but actually prove drugging
testimony_analysis.walsh_credibility: Appears authoritative but hiding his own involvement
